result.reason: Feature request for a presentation mode to maximize screen real estate during demos or focused work.
result.approach: Implement a new PresentationModeHandler class to toggle UI visibility (panels, menus) and enable RDP Smart Size. Integrate with FrmMain and add a menu item/shortcut (Shift+F11) in ViewMenu.
